about_the_game:
Madness Music Pack is composed with darkness in mind. Its melodic themes are perfect for boss fights, unsettling encounters and soul-shattering revelations. Composed by JDB Artist, this unique pack is a fantastic addition to your ever-growing music library.

Features:
  • 22 music BGM themes.
  • Mix of battle, character and area themes.
  • m4a, .ogg, .mp3 and .wav formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects.

Track List
  • All For Nothing
  • Ashen Queen
  • Dark Power
  • Echelon
  • Fighting Will
  • Graveyard
  • Her Name is Madness
  • Hounted Mansion
  • Hunters
  • Innocence
  • Ivory And Scarlett
  • Lost
  • Madden Scientist Gone to Hell
  • Old School Run
  • Old School Trap
  • Salvation
  • Tense Atmosphere
  • The Fallen King
  • Twisted Dreams Gone Wild
  • Uneven Fight
  • Unsacred Grounds
  • Waiting

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Madness Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Are you on the lookout for something intense and tinged with evil?
